abstract: The Walt Disney Company‘s $350 million deal in August to buy Club Penguin has given venture capitalists something to think about. The deal, CNet News says, has V.C.’s scouring for other investment opportunities in online virtual worlds for kids.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company‘s $350 million deal in August to buy Club Penguin has given venture capitalists something to think about. The deal, CNet News says, has V.C.’s scouring for other investment opportunities in online virtual worlds for kids.
